description: Returning Lucas Entertainment superstar Chad Hunt requests a new blond model to break in. He gets his wish in the well-built Scott Baker, who sucks on his gargantuan dick on a scenic rooftop terrace. Then its back indoors for some hot 69 action. Luckily, Bakers meaty, creamy ass is up to the challenge of Hunts monster meat.
title: Chad Hunt and Scott Baker
